org.jacpfx.api.component

Interface IHandleable<A,M>

  • Type Parameters:
    A - defines the basic message type
    M - defines the basic message type
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    public interface IHandleable<A,M>
    This interface defines components which are able to handle a single message.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <C> C handle(IAction<A,M> message)
      Handles component when called.

    • Method Detail

      • handle

        <C> C handle(IAction<A,M> message)
        Handles component when called. The handle method in subcomponents is always executed in a separate thread;
        Type Parameters:
        C - the node return type
        Parameters:
        message - , the triggering message
        Returns:
        view component
